title: Masters Golf Preview
itunes:title: Masters Golf Preview
description:
Is there Anything Better than Bill & Paul betting on golf?

 If you haven’t signed up for BetMGM yet, use bonus code BURR and you’ll get $200 Free after placing your first $10 bet if any golfer makes a birdie during this week’s gold tournament! Here’s how it works:

  1. Download the BetMGM app and sign up using bonus code BURR
  2. Place your first $10 bet on this week’s golf tournament.
  3. You’ll receive $200 in free bets immediately after placing your bet if any golfer makes a birdie, regardless of the outcome!

Just make sure you use bonus code BURR when you sign up!
